Help:Node.title: Painter
Help:Node.Log:Description:
GENERAL CONCEPT: painter
As a painter, you have the ability to capture images on parchment or canvases. First, you'll need to get a paintbrush and paint or a set of pencils from the merchant in the art studio. You can only paint or draw on canvases.. Once you have these, find a subject you want to paint. Currently, you can only paint the 'look' of a person or the 'look' of an item. Examines cannot be captured. Depending on your skill, specific objects in an area cannot be captured either. The command to paint is 'PAINT [SUBJECT] ON MY CANVAS USING MY PAINT', or if you have pencils 'DRAW [SUBJECT] ON MY CANVAS USING MY PENCILS'. Roleplay is encouraged to make your work believable, and it helps depict the personality of the artist. Now you need work? Try offering to do personal portraits for denizens, or simply put your portrait to sell on one of the trading tables in the market place. For further assistance contact fellow painters in game. TESTING HERE.
SEE ALSO: ,
